fields.bio: I blend the rhythms of Music City with the peace of native gardens. My designs focus on sustainable beauty, bringing drought-resistant and wildlife-friendly spaces to life.
I'm an urban gardener dedicated to transforming city spaces into green oases. I specialize in creating rooftop gardens and vertical green walls that contribute to cleaner, greener urban environments.
I thrive on the challenge of Southern Californiaâ€™s diverse climates. From succulent gardens to lush vegetable patches, I design spaces that are as functional as they are beautiful.
I harness the rich soils of Eastern Kentucky to grow heirloom vegetables and herbs. My gardens are a blend of tradition and innovation, aimed at promoting local food security and sustainability.
